statements: SELECT full_name, email FROM CustomerData WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number FROM CustomerData ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT email, full_name FROM CustomerData WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT full_name, registration_date FROM CustomerData WHERE birthdate >= '1985-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM CustomerData WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY email ASC
SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number FROM CustomerData WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number, birthdate FROM CustomerData WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM CustomerData WHERE birthdate >= '1985-01-01' AND birthdate <= '1995-12-31' ORDER BY birthdate
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, product_name FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, amount FROM Customers c JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(transaction_date) AS latest_transaction_date FROM Customers c JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Customers c JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone, customer_age FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender, customer_age FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age < 30 ORDER BY customer_name, customer_age;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age > 30
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age < 25 ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_gender = 'Male' AND customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analysis_score FROM behavioral_analysis WHERE analysis_score >= 4.0
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, age ASC
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_id FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY join_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, behavior_type, behavior_score FROM customers JOIN customer_behavior ON customers.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id WHERE behavior_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, registration_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, pr.unit_price FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id INNER JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN customer_behavior cb ON c.customer_id = cb.customer_id INNER JOIN customer_interactions ci ON c.customer_id = ci.customer_id LEFT JOIN customer_behavior cb2 ON c.customer_id = cb2.customer_id WHERE cb.behavior_score >= 70 AND ci.interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND ci.interaction_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY cb.behavior_type ASC, ci.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(p.total_amount) AS total_purchase_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases p GROUP BY p.customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT cb.behavior_type, AVG(cb.behavior_score) AS avg_behavior_score FROM customer_behavior cb GROUP BY cb.behavior_type HAVING AVG(cb.behavior_score) > 50 ORDER BY avg_behavior_score DESC;
